channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Inside the Louvre Jewel Heist That Shocked the World
item.description: More than a week after thieves made off with treasures from the Louvre, a picture is emerging of a seemingly well-planned burglary that exploited secu...

item.title: China just purchased its first U.S. soybeans from this year’s harvest before Trump and Xi meet at economic summit
item.description: The progress marks quicker negotiations between the two countries after China’s crackdown on rare-earths exports, expert says.

item.title: French Police Arrest 5 More in Louvre Jewel Heist Investigation
item.description: The authorities have detained seven suspects in total, but have not recovered the stolen jewels.

item.title: Trump and Xi, Hoping to Ease Trade War, Agree to 1-Year Truce
item.description: China agreed to suspend for a year some of its limits on exports of rare earth metals, while the U.S. halved its fentanyl-related tariffs.

item.title: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella says Bill Gates told him his big bet on OpenAI would be a flop: ‘Yeah, you’re going to burn this billion dollars’
item.description: Nadella said despite the risk, “it was not that hard to convince anyone.”

item.title: Longevity science is on the cusp of major breakthroughs thanks to AI, but significant ‘data gaps’ need to be filled, expert says
item.description: There’s a dearth of data about how differences in gender, ethnicities, and environments can affect the aging process.

item.title: Delta CEO Ed Bastian says one key to building customer loyalty is ‘obsessing’ over your own staff
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: U.S. Beef and Thousand Island Dressing: Trump’s Food Tour of Asia
item.description: The menus on the president’s tour of three countries in Asia reflected the culinary acrobatics the host nations performed to accommodate his palate an...

item.title: How Xi Walked Away From Trump Trade Talks Looking Stronger
item.description: By withholding soybean purchases and rare-earth exports, China extracted relief from U.S. tariffs and delayed export controls, without conceding much ...

item.title: AI is the common threat—and the secret sauce—for security startups in the Fortune Cyber 60
item.description: The latest installment of the Fortune Cyber 60 list, created in partnership with Lightspeed Venture Partners, reveals how critical AI security has bec...
